section.name: Installation
section.p: The program set is packaged in a self-contained TAR/GZIP file. The package can be extracted with the following command (where X.X.X is the current version):
The contents of the package are as follows:

ul.li: bin - Directory containing the executables. * start_crawler.csh - command to execute a generic crawler.
lib - contains the required *.jar files to run commands in ../bin

useCommon.csh - source file for setting the classpath necessary to run the commands in /bin.
That's it for installation, just untar and unzip it to the directory you want to run it out of.
